definitions.text: the attire worn in a play or at a fancy dress ball
examples: he won the prize for best costume

definitions.text: unusual or period attire not characteristic of or appropriate to the time and place
examples: in spite of the heat he insisted on his woolen costume

definitions.text: the prevalent fashion of dress (including accessories and hair style as well as garments)
the attire characteristic of a country or a time or a social class

examples: We dressed up for Halloween as pumpkins

definitions.text: furnish with costumes; as for a film or play
